summary: Feature request to warn when the server-provided task start time differs significantly from when the SDK begins processing the task. Request was declined as too niche.
userImpact: Users would receive warnings when task timing discrepancies occur, helping identify timing-related issues during task execution.
resolutionDetails: Declined by maintainers as the feature was deemed too niche for the use cases it would serve.
keyQuote: We're not gonna do this. Too niche.
